probable_cause: Exceeding Java heap space due to memory consumption by the application
impact: Application crashes due to memory issues
recommended_next_steps: Monitor memory usage of the application to identify the cause
Consider increasing Java heap space or implementing memory management strategies within the application
Analyze logs for any recurring patterns or issues that could be causing high memory consumption

confidence.confidence_reason: Clear OutOfMemoryError signature, Issue observed multiple times, Specific component identified
